name: white goods
description:
Made for the weekly-hour jam....

So I wanted my son to review his physics lessons... had plenty of items to put in... Started with something... Ended there at the same place. Lots of debugging. Lots of energy.

Besides had to use Scratch for some project with kids at the fablab. Before end of the year and the weekly jam, I'll publish in Unity hopefully :-)
